name: The Suit of Mr. Snake
description:
Mr. Snake lost his suit and he's naked. He's no control and he's suffering. Somebody helps him and supplies him different suits.

The Suit of Mr. Snake is the final project of BAU Game Design Graduate Program aka Master BUG's Game Design Studio class. Made with PuzzleScript, in 6 hours. It's a 2D puzzle game with tile based movement.

The final project's theme was "superhero" and we need to choose a brand. I chose a condom brand, called Okey, and the superhero is Mr. Snake. This game could be used as a viral ad introducing different condom types, using metaphors. Three different types of condoms are subjected in the game; regular, textured and ultra thin.

You can hack the game from here.

Soundtrack is available on Spotify.
